s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BLOWER MOTOR WITH FAN SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Install the blower motor with fan sub-assembly with the 3 screws.
Attach the clip and connect the connector.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BLOWER RESISTOR (for Manual Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Install the blower resistor with the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BLOWER MOTOR CONTROL (for Automatic Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Install the blower motor control with the 2 screws.
Attach the claw to install the air filter case.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL AIR INLET DAMPER CONTROL CABLE SUB-ASSEMBLY (for Manual Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws to install the air inlet damper control cable sub-assembly.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECIRCULATION DAMPER SERVO SUB-ASSEMBLY (for Automatic Air Conditioning System)

s2.ptxt: Install the recirculation damper servo sub-assembly with 3 screws.
Attach the claw to install the lever.
